tool_description:
Effortlessly Upgrade Your Web2 App to Web3.

DropChain is the web3 developer toolkit that provides everything you need to build fully functional web3 products using the frameworks you already know. Step into the world of web3 using RESTful API integrations or existing no-code tools.

DropChain is a web2.5 bridge that turns your web2 apps into robust web3 experiences, built for web2 natives.
name: DropChain
title: DropChain

api_list.name: DropchainApi_updateAssetMetadataDropnet
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dropchain1.p.rapidapi.com/dropchain/v1/update_asset_metadata_dropnet"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dropchain1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
